```{r}
#| context: setup
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
runif(1000000) %>%
  qnorm() %>%
  hist(breaks = 50)
```

```{r}
df<-data.frame(miu=runif(1000,min=1,max=100),sigma=runif(1000,min=1,max=20)) %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(sample=list(rnorm(25,miu,sigma)),
         x_bar=mean(sample),
         sd=sd(sample),
         ci_lower=x_bar-1.96*sd/5,
         ci_upper=x_bar+1.96*sd/5,
         within_ci=ifelse(miu>ci_lower & miu <ci_upper,1,0))

mean(df$within_ci)
```
